title: One-to-One Property
text: When two logarithms share the same base, their arguments must be equal to each other.

title: Set Arguments Equal
text: Set the arguments of the two logarithms with the same base equal to each other to solve for $$x$$.

title: Setting Arguments Equal
text: What is the equation to solve after setting the arguments of the two logarithm functions equal to each other?

title: Solving a Quadratic Equation
text: To solve the quadratic equation, move all terms to one side and set it equal to zero.

title: Factor
text: Once all terms are moved to one side, factor the quadratic by finding two numbers that add to $$-2$$ and multiply to $$-3$$.

title: Zero Product Property
text: If two factors are equal to zero, one or the other has to also be equal to zero.

title: Equal to Zero
text: To solve for the value of $$x$$, set both factors equal to zero and solve for $$x$$. Find the negative solution.
